channel.title: Server
channel.description: Sorry about other postes.I need help in the making of my server.I am at the winrar part were you have the client name you downloaded and You have the option to.Select all,extract,ETC.What do I do next.

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @baez9 baez9
item.description:
@baez9 wrote:

Highlight the folder you would like to extract and click extract to and choose desktop, it should apear on your desktop. To get it running, first of all compile and check for any errors the previous owner did not fix. Then if you have no errors just simply double click run and go on a client put your username and password, leave the IP part empty and log on! If you have any other questions just add my MSN on my profile.

Read full topic

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @ZA_H ZÃ©H
item.description:
@ZA_H wrote:

OK once you have extracted the Yourservername.Zip its creates the folder with all your data that you will need to run your server and to edit it.

So 1st you will need to make sure your compiler worker. double click the compile.bat and if there are no errors then your in the clear so far.
If so most likly you havent change the JDK to the proper update (being one you downloaded on your computer)
So if you have error, right click complier.bat and select “Edit”

Search for something alont the lines of

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java

Just change the last two number in the “jdk1.6.0_11” to your update that you downloaded (11 being newst)

moving on double click run.bat
if is runs it will say something like

"Starting Yourservername Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
open you client your using and just put for Ip “0.0.0.0” without quotes

then log in

Read full topic
